WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 25 February 2024
Condition of Rain:
Showers  or  thundershowers  may  occur  at  a  few  places  in  the  sea  areas  extending  from
Colombo to Hambantota via Galle in the evening or night.
Winds:
Winds will be North-easterly or Easterly and wind speed will be (20-25) kmph in the sea areas
around the island.
Wind speed may increase up to (40-45) kmph at times in the sea areas off the coasts extending
from Galle to Hambantota via Matara and from Puttalam to Kankasanthurai via Mannar.
State of Sea:
The  sea  areas  off  the  coasts  extending  from  Galle  to  Hambantota  via  Matara  and  from
Puttalam  to  Kankasanthurai  via  Mannar  can  be  fairly  rough  at  times.    The  other  sea  areas
around the island will be Slight.
